configuration:
mapred.reduce.tasks 12
total.tuple.size 50
tscube.sample.bias 1.1
total.uid.size 100000000
total.machine.number 12
d2.lattice.region.number 15
d2.tscubebatch.sample.region.number 4
max.reducer.limit.byte 1000000000
percent.mem.usage 1
one.tuple.size.by.byte 100
hdfs.root.path /user/zhouyy/
dataset d2
dataset.input.path _input_
mrcube.mr1.output.path _output_mrcube_mr1/
mrcube.mr2.output.path _output_mrcube_mr2/
mrcube.mr3.output.path _output_mrcube_mr3/
mrcube.region.partition.file.path part-r-00000
mrcube.mr3.input.path.filter .*part.*
naive.output.path _output_naive/
wordcount.output.path _output_wordcount/
naive.ba.output.path _output_naive_ba/
naive.mr2.output.path _output_naive_mr2/
tscube.mr1.output.path _output_tscube_mr1/
tscube.mr2.output.path _output_tscube_mr2/
tscube.mr3.output.path _output_tscube_mr3/ d
tscube.boundary.file.path part-r-00000
